=====
expit
=====

Overview
--------

The expit function.

Installation
------------

To install expit, you can use ``pip``. Open your terminal and run:

.. code-block:: bash

    pip install expit

Example
-------

To calculate the function value of 0.42 in the shell:

.. code-block:: bash

    py -m expit 0.42

Or inside of a python script:

.. code-block:: python

    import expit
    print(expit.function(0.42))
